snippet: Phillips, 39, once a star at Nebraska, is serving a sentence of more than 31 years in California.
abstract: Former NFL running back Lawrence Phillips is suspected of murdering cellmate Damion Soward at Kern Valley State Prison in California; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Phillips, 39, once a star at Nebraska, is serving a sentence of more than 31 years in California.

headline.main: Former Football Player Lawrence Phillips Suspected of Killing Cellmate
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; Former Player Is Suspect in Killing of Cellmate
